comment.author: 37547255@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/11418107@N02] Thanks for sharing the results of your creativity with us. :-) I like the purse. It's really interesting to see our images being put to use in new and creative ways! Elin, The County Archives in Sogn og Fjordane.

comment._content: Great! :) It's interesting to see that our images are an inspiration and can be put to new use. Thanks for sharing! Elin
